column23: /mə’kəm/ 'three' (Banna=Hamar) (Omotic: Eastern); /mɛkɛm/ 'three' (Dime), /m’hayb----/ 'three' (Beja) (North Cushitic) (Bender 1971) (not sure what last symbol ---- is),
column41: /wɛrr-/ 'snake' (Alaba), /wɛ’r-/ 'snake' (Kembata) (East Cushitic: Highland), /cɨrɛ/ 'snake' (Chaha), /c’ə́rɛ̀/ 'snake' (Innemor), /7arwẽː/ 'snake' (Tigre) (Ethiosemitic), /jõːwe/ 'snake' (Qottu Galla) (East Cushitic: North Oromoid)(Bender 1971)
column44: nakút 'stick used for digging and weeding' Ik (Heine 1999)
column107: /mãːnja/ 'fire' (Gumuz) (Koman-Gumuz), etc.; /mac/ 'fire' (Anyuak), etc. (Western Nilotic); /mãːt----/ 'fire' (Mesengo) (Surmic) (Bender 1971) (not sure what last symbol ---- is)

column40: /kimbiro/ 'bird' (Saho) (East Cushitic: Northern); /sɨm’bɨrre/ 'bird' (Borena Galla) (East Cushitic: North Oromoid) (Bender 1971)

column52: /d’iɡa/ 'blood' (Borena Galla), /d’ĩːɡa/ 'blood' (Mecha Galla) (East Cushitic: North Oromoid) ; /d’iɡa/ 'blood' (Bussa) (East Cushitic: Konsoid-Oromoid), etc.
column102: /biyce/ 'water' (Arbore) (East Cushitic: South Oromoid) , /biʃan/ 'water' (Mecha Galla) (East Cushitic: North Oromoid) (Bender 1971)
